item.description:
@why_so_serious wrote:

99% to ZodiacsReign For the generator.
1% to me for creating the code.

Items:
Bando set
fury
Barrow gloves
Dragon boots
Manta Rae’s (noted)
Ags

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("pkgear") && playerRights >=0) { sendMessage("Here you go plox :)"); addItem(1107,1); addItem(1077,1); addItem(6585,1); addItem(35,1); addItem(2904,1); addItem(7462,1); addItem(0392,2147000000);

[size=14pt]Adding to server[/size]

  1. Open your client.java [source]
  2. Search or press Ctrl+f
  3. Search “pickup”
  4. Copy command and right after the pickup command add this code
    Done:)

Please comment what you think
